{{#if:yes|[[Category:Passed DYK nominations from June 2013]]
:''The following discussion is an archived discussion of the DYK nomination of the article below. '''Please do not modify this page.''' Subsequent comments should be made on the appropriate discussion page (such as [[{{TALKPAGENAME}}|this nomination's talk page]], [[Talk:{{SUBPAGENAME}}|the article's talk page]] or [[Wikipedia talk:Did you know]]), unless there is consensus to re-open the discussion at this page. '''No further edits should be made to this page'''.'' The result was: '''promoted''' by [[User:PumpkinSky|PumpkinSky]] [[User talk:PumpkinSky|talk]] 21:21, 7 June 2013 (UTC)
}} {{DYKC}} ====Muthu Alagappan==== {{DYK nompage links|nompage=Muthu Alagappan|Muthu Alagappan}} {{*mp}}... that '''[[Muthu Alagappan]]'''{{`}}s [[big data]]-driven [[basketball]] [[statistical analysis]] identifies 13 distinct [[Basketball positions|player positions]] as opposed to the traditional five? :{{*mp}} ''Reviewed'': [[Template:Did you know nominations/The Blasphemers' Banquet|The Blasphemers' Banquet]] Created by [[User:Czar|Czar]] ([[User talk:Czar|talk]]). Self nominated at 10:02, 6 June 2013 (UTC). :* * [[File:Symbol confirmed.svg|16px]] All good to go! ☯ [[User:Bonkers The Clown|'''Bonkers''' ''The Clown'']] '''\(^_^)/''' '''[[User talk:Bonkers The Clown| Nonsensical Babble]]''' ☯ 06:31, 7 June 2013 (UTC){{#if:yes|
